В неё должен поиграть каждый. Посмотря Куплинова, я сначала пожалел о покупки , но потом я сыграл и был очень раз. В игру интересно играть особенно с друзьями по ДС.

This is the best of the horror/killer/hunter games I've played. There aren't that many, but this i the one I prefer. Some of the community is great, some are the most toxic people I've played with, and that's including COD and R6 Siege. It's greatly improved over the years, and puts games like Friday the 13th to shame. It does have some bugginess to it, some unfair mechanics at times, and some days loading times and dropped players are really bad. I still recommend it. 7/10
Very fun game. Both roles are very engaging and the dev team is constantly working on improving it. Definitely worth buying and playing.

Dieses Spiel ist einfach nur der Hammer!!! Es lässt nicht nur den Ingame-Charakter das Herz rasen, nein auch der Spieler hinter dem Pad/ Tastatur bekommt einen Puls seines Lebens (gespielt als Überlebender). Da nun auch noch das 4. Jubiläum den Auftakt mit neuen Charas und Perks an den Start gebracht hat, ist der Spielspaß um so höher. Auch als Killer bleibst du nicht aus und bei wilden Jagten ist der nächste Überlende nicht fern.
super recomendo

Recomiendo este juego si en tu vida personal todo va bien y no tienes ninguna relación tóxica.
Al principio todo será bueno, un jueguito aparentemente de miedo, que cuando juegas de survi con tus chavales todos son risas y cuando juegas de killer todo son risas.
Poco a poco la relación se va a ir oscureciendo y tu vas notar que la comunidad no es particularmente buena. Hay rusos. Muchos rusos. Y yo soy podemita pero los rusos, son rusos hermano.
Ya después de un tiempo, cuando la relación se asiente y te vayas a vivir con el juego a la misma casa, descubrirás sus bugs. ¿Cómo una compañía tan sumamente millonaria tiene tantos bugs?¿Cómo siempre se buggea el juego pero no la manera de darles dinero?¿Por qué sigo jugando a este juego?  Preguntas sin respuestas
Es ist sehr interessant zu spielen und Nervenkitzel Pur. Es ist abwechslungsreich, leicht verständlich aber trotzdem anspruchsvoll.

This game is a lot of fun! It's suspenseful and thrilling to play. I play primarily as survivor and I enjoy sneaking around trying to repair generators while trying to rescue teammates when possible, It's rewarding when the gates finally open to try to escape and help others escape. It's a great team based survival horror game. I highly recommend it.

Riddled with bugs, and developer focus seems to be more on creating/selling content than on balancing the gameplay mechanics. What started as a great idea in which a sole killer was pitted against a group of four random survivors and contained elements of surprise, cat/mouse chases, hide and seek, etc. has been slowly devolved into a game where the killer has so many aura abilities to know where survivors are without having to search, and the survivors are all just skin bags for the same set of abilities. Now, it's basically a game of who can run from the killer the longest, and the RNG of the map and layout more often than not determines how many survivors escape/get sacrificed.

The poor matchmaking and introduction of Survive With Friends has exacerbated the issues because attempting to balance a game where a killer can face four random survivors with zero communication ability among themselves versus a game with four survivors that are all in a group together and communicate information to each other creates drastic swings in balance back and forth that Behaviour has been unable to resolve.

Also, some maps heavily favor survivors while others heavily favor killers which leads to players on both sides simply disconnecting from the match in order to get a more fair map for themselves.

Rather than trying to fix the fundamental flaws introduced to this game early after launch, Behaviour has simply ignored most of the basic issues in favor of content creation. This has been enough to keep the game alive and generate revenue, but the underlying flaws in the game design have been ignored. The biggest reason for DBD's success hasn't been due to the game design, but rather the lack of competition in the genre. As soon as a viable alternative arises that addresses the underlying balance flaws in the gameplay, Dead By Daylight will likely lose a good portion of the player base it depends on.

Dead by Daylight is both original and amazing, probably the best multiplayer horror game there is without much competition. The game is well balanced and good players can explore a variety of different approaches by playing as a satisfying roster of survivors and killers. All in all a fantastic game. On the other hand, I would warn new players that the community is less than appropriate at times and you can expect some serious toxicity from a lot of players. I have probably reported more players on this game than any other I have played for abusive language in the chat after a game or trolling people in game. The team working on this game seem to be on the ball though and I would recommend to ALWAYS report toxic killers and survivors when necessary to help the game admins identify and punish immature players. Other than this issue however this is an incredible a game and by far one my all time favourites.

Fun with friends. Kinda trash solo. Bugs that favor killer seem to get fixed more quickly than bugs that favor survivor. Like the totems/hex totems that constantly get spawned in unreachable areas. Hit box is kinda bs. When I'm already on the ground running I shouldn't be able to get hit through the window. Match-making is ridiculous. I'm higher rank and get placed with low rank killers. I get to a lower rank and all I can find are high rank killers that engage in camping, tunneling, body-blocking, or meta nonsense.

I do not recommend playing this game. I would not recommend buying it for anyone. It is a broken game. Developers do not care for the actual issues in the game. I have played nearly 250 hours and the game is imbalanced, favouring killers to a level that is insane. Survivors are constantly nerfed for no apparent reasons and killers are buffed. Wiggling, hooks and everything is favoured so hard to the killer, even if your whole survivor team takes a hit plus slows the killer down, it isn't enough to actually change the gameplay.

Hackers do not get banned. Reports do not get any sort of attention. If you want to have a chance of escaping more than 1 person through hatch, you need a full team of premades working together extremely well. I am tired of being trolled and camped by killers, who can win easily by using those tactics, although they should have no chance of winning when they literally just camp one hook. Developers in this game needs to wake the fuck up.

I hope that everyone who plays this game steps away from it and leaves it, so it becomes dead, maybe then the developers will consider listening to the playerbase rather than only killers. I hope they also see this message, because as someone who used to play a lot and play with rank 1 survivors constantly, without having the patience to get there myself, we can obviously see the game is flawed and the development is not bringing it to a better state.
